title: Names of flowers in Poetica ornaments
content:
Hello,

I was wondering if anyone knew the names of the flowers that are depicted in the supplemental ornament set of the poetica font family — specifically, the flowers associated with the letters f, g, h, i, and j. (these are the five characters that depict just a head of a blossom, no leaves).

thanks !  
-claudia

 [‹ Franklin Gothic Light Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080101094942/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17748 "Go to previous forum topic") [indesign clipping path ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080101094942/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17702 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ClaudiaF
